professional_summary: Results-driven professional with over 8 years of experience in project coordination, business processes, and stakeholder engagement. Proven track record in ensuring project success through effective communication, documentation, and coordination across teams.

key_responsibilities: Coordinated projects using traditional project management methods to ensure value delivery to customers.
Engaged stakeholders in bi-weekly project reviews to provide updates and gather feedback.
Maintained organized documentation of client relationships using Salesforce.
Negotiated contract terms to maximize revenue and meet client needs.
Supported cross-functional teams in lean development and product delivery.
Managed the sales cycle and ensured customer satisfaction post-delivery.
Supported downstream operations in biotechnology production.
Ensured compliance with quality standards and safety protocols.
